actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

official_title: To establish the Hawai'i Capital National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.
short_title: Hawai'i Capital National Heritage Area Establishment Act

summary.text: Hawai'i Capital National Heritage Area Establishment Act - Establishes the Hawai'i Capital National Heritage Area in Hawai'i which shall consist of portions of Honolulu and the Honolulu Ahupua'a. Designates the Hawai'i Capital Cultural Coalition as the local coordinating entity for the Area. Requires the Coalition to prepare and submit a management plan for the Area.

titles.title: Hawai'i Capital National Heritage Area Establishment Act
To establish the Hawai'i Capital National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.
